content.text:
# Traditional hardball hockey

#REDIRECT Roller hockey
Hardball Hockey in the United States is also called Traditional hardball hockey and Rink-Hockey in other parts of the world; many players in Spain only know of the sport as Hoquei em Patins. Worldwide all are referred to as Roller Hockey.  Roller Hockey was the official name of the sport in the 1992 Olympics. Today it is know by many names under the Roller Hockey Umbrella.
